folder: Richmond Terrace & Lafayette Avenue, Staten Island, NY
text:
686 Richmond Terrace, adjoing the S.E. corner of Lafayette Avenue, showing the Brandon Stevens Institute. The house was owned in 1874 by W. F. Gray and in 1898 by Mrs. Lozier.

July 7, 1932

P. L. Sperr
title: Richmond: Richmond Terrace - Lafayette Avenue
